  <smcilnkh>true</smcilnkh>             <lworkcit>                <citeinfo>                   <serinfo/>                   <pubinfo/>                </citeinfo>             </lworkcit>          </citeinfo>       </citation>       <descript>          <abstract>The Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC) Collection of Treaty Texts consists of environmental treaty texts compiled in collaboration with the Columbia University Center for International Earth Science Information Network (CIESIN), United Nations Environmental Programme (UNEP), Tufts University Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy (FSLD), British Columbia Ministry of Environment, Lands, and Parks (BCMELP), Antarctic Cooperative Research Centre (ACRC), and American Society of International Law (ASIL).</abstract>          <purpose>To provide search and retrieval of texts of multilateral environmental agreements (MEAs)</purpose>          <supplinf>Treaty texts can be accessed via the ENTRI Query Service at http://sedac.ciesin.columbia.edu/entri.</supplinf>       </descript>       <timeperd>          <timeinfo>             <rngdates>                <begdate>19401012</begdate>                <enddate>20000905</enddate>             </rngdates>          </timeinfo>       </timeperd>       <status>          <progress>Complete</progress>          <update>As needed</update>       </status>
